    FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

    WHAT WE OFFER

    A variety of short and long-term medical and travel plans for individuals and groups, with rates as low as 60¢ per person, per day (rates vary with age and plan benefits).

    Ministry and frequent traveler insurance especially suited for ministries with multiple travelers each year.

    Furlough medical, trip cancellation, high limit AD&D, international term life insurance… and much, much more!

    HOW ARE WE DIFFERENT

    Multi-Quote capabilities that allow you to shop from the leading providers of missionary medical and travel insurance all at one website.

    Go Mission Trip's purpose is to provide the best and most affordable short term and long term health insurance to missionaries serving all around the world. We thank you for your business and are excited to partner with you by providing you value and support.
